definitions.definition: The ventral area (very bottom) of the human body between where the legs fork from the torso , in the area of the genitals and anus .
examples: Every mile they rode their crotches felt worse saddlepain.

definitions.definition: Either the male or female genitalia .
examples: He cringed at being kicked in the crotch .

definitions.definition: The area where something forks or branches : where a ramification takes place.
examples: There is a child sitting in a crotch of that tree.

definitions.definition: In the three-ball carom game, a small space at each corner of the table.
The open counter ( negative space ) formed by two downward strokes that meet at an internal acute angle , potentially above a vertex , as in the letters " V " and " Y ".

main_definition: The ventral area (very bottom) of the human body between where the legs fork from the torso , in the area of the genitals and anus .
secondary_definitions: ( slang , euphemistic ) Either the male or female genitalia .
The area where something forks or branches : where a ramification takes place.
( billiards ) In the three-ball carom game, a small space at each corner of the table.
( typography ) The open counter ( negative space ) formed by two downward strokes that meet at an internal acute angle , potentially above a vertex , as in the letters " V " and " Y ".
